Name: Coco Milky Way
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice and pour into glass.
Review: Cachaça laced pineapple, coconut and cream with hints of almond and hazelnut.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Daniel Sampere at One Ocean Club, Barcelona, Spain.
Nutrition: One serving of Coco Milky Way contains 246 calories
Garnish: Lemon zest & slice of Milky Way chocolate bar
